text: But when this son of yours came, who has devoured your livelihood with prostitutes, you killed the fatted calf for him!â€™The older brother's attitude really wasn't all that unreasonable. Why should the younger son be rewarded for his irresponsible conduct? The father was celebrating the recovery, not the irresponsibility. The fatted calf was for a special occasion, and the older son's faithful service was routine. However, he probably did get a young goat, after that.
